alert.note: Alert for Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued May 09 at 5:04AM EDT until May 10 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT TUESDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Warning, two to three feet of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 9 to 12 feet in the surf zone. * WHERE...In Virginia, Virginia Beach. In North Carolina, Eastern Currituck County. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Warning, until 8 AM EDT Tuesday. For the High Surf Advisory, until 6 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate to locally severe flooding will cause extensive inundation and flooding of numerous roads and buildings resulting in a significant threat to property and life. Water will be 2 to 3 feet or more above ground level in some areas. Flooding will extend inland from the waterfront and shoreline flooding homes, businesses, and neighborhoods. Numerous roads will likely be closed. Large breaking waves will result in beach erosion and damage to dune structures. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. CHESAPEAKE BAY BRIDGE TUNNEL VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 5.0 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.1 FT, MODERATE 2.6 FT, MAJOR 3.1 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/04 AM 4.9 2.0 2.6 5 NONE 09/03 PM 5.3 2.4 3.0 5-6 MINOR 10/04 AM 5.5 2.6 3.1 5-6 MODERATE 10/04 PM 5.2 2.3 2.8 6 MINOR 11/04 AM 5.1 2.2 2.7 5 MINOR 11/05 PM 5.0 2.1 2.3 5 MINOR LYNNHAVEN INLET VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 5.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/04 AM 5.2 2.5 3.1 6 MODERATE 09/04 PM 5.3 2.6 3.4 6 MODERATE 10/04 AM 5.6 2.9 3.5 6 MAJOR 10/05 PM 5.4 2.7 3.3 6 MODERATE 11/05 AM 5.2 2.5 3.1 5 MODERATE 11/06 PM 4.9 2.2 2.7 5 MINOR SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/04 AM 5.1 2.3 2.8 4 MINOR 09/04 PM 5.5 2.7 3.4 4 MODERATE 10/05 AM 5.6 2.8 3.3 4 MODERATE 10/05 PM 5.6 2.8 3.3 3 MODERATE 11/06 AM 5.4 2.6 3.1 3 MINOR 11/06 PM 5.3 2.5 2.8 3 MINOR COROLLA NC MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 5.5 FT, MODERATE 6.0 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/04 AM 5.6 1.9 3.1 11 MINOR 09/03 PM 5.6 1.9 2.9 1 NONE 10/03 AM 6.1 2.4 3.2 1 MINOR 10/04 PM 6.0 2.3 3.1 1 MINOR 11/04 AM 5.9 2.2 2.9 1 MINOR 11/05 PM 5.5 1.8 2.3 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
